item.description:
Please join us at UUCW on April 21 at 9 am for an Earth Day Clean-
up! The Greater Worcester Humanists and the UUCW Green Team have
coordinated with the Regional Environmental Council, so we'll have
trash bags and gloves for you. The City of Worcester’s Department of
Public Works will haul our piles away to be recycled or used as fuel
at the Millbury Wheelabrator trash-to-energy facility. Last year, with
the help of organizational partners like us and more than 1,000
volunteers, more than 36 tons of trash were removed from 65 sites
throughout Worcester. Help us clean up around the UUCW property and
along the shore of Indian Lake!.  Wear "cleanup" garb and bring gloves.

_______________________________________________________

REC is a grassroots environmental justice organization located in Worcester, Massachusetts--New England's second largest city. Founded in 1971, REC has been dedicated to building healthy, sustainable and just communities in Worcester and beyond for almost 40 years.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be near the other volunteers
item.name: Help Clean Up Worcester! Earth Day Volunteering
